name: MergeResult

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: Returns a list of Database.Error objects representing the errors encountered, if any, during a merge operation using the Database.merge method. If no error occurred, returns null.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the master record into which other records were merged.

methods.name: getMergedRecordIds
methods.description: Returns the IDs of the records merged into the master record.

methods.name: getUpdatedRelatedIds
methods.description: Returns the IDs of all related records that were reparented as a result of the merge that are viewable by the user sending the merge call.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: Indicates whether the merge was successful (true) or not (false).

description: Contains the result of a merge Database method operation.
